lines.text: Hop it, as the monkey said to the kangaroo.
Beat it, as the monkey said to the egg whisk.
Search me, as the monkey said to his mate.
What's cooking, as the monkey said to the cannibal chief.
Dry up, as the monkey said to the leaky tap.
Don't get pickled, as the monkey said to the onion.
Take a running jump at yourself, as the monkey said to the performing flea.
See you in the dock sometime, as the monkey said to the tramp steamer.
No hard feelings, as the monkey said to the... oh what's the use, you never laughed at my jokes anyway.
That's a nice bit of junk, as the monkey said to the Chinese sailor.
I was selling off war surplus before the war even started!
Funiculi, funicula, as the monkey said when the Iti took him up the mountain.
